title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When trying to view the type hierarchy in a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Could you please explain the meaning of this message?
OB: When attempting to view the type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' is displayed.
EB: When attempting to view the type hierarchy of a binary project, the class hierarchies of the internal jars should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open a binary project in the IDE.
2. Navigate to the type hierarchy view.
3. Select a type within org.apache.ant.
4. Observe the displayed message about the absence of selected members in the chosen hierarchy.
